explains: n. 参赛者，竞争者；争辩者

sentences.en: The fifth contestant won the biggest prize.
sentences.cn: 第五名选手赢得了最高奖。

sentences.en: As a contestant, I think, one should be confident and full of hope.
sentences.cn: 作为一名选手，我认为应该充满信心和希望。

sentences.en: If a contestant injures himself while attempting to foul his opponent, the referee will not take any action in his favor.
sentences.cn: 如果参赛者在企图对对手犯规时弄伤了自己，裁判将不会采取对他有利的行动。
